polling.query: SELECT TOP 1 T1.order_nr, T1.aantal_uur_gepland, CONVERT(varchar, T1.planning_datum) planning_datum, T1.aantal, T1.opmerking, CONVERT(varchar, T1.planning_datum_tot) planning_datum_tot, T1.achterstand, T1.aantal_uren_geboekt, T1.tekening_nr FROM dbo.machine_planning T1 WHERE T1.machine_id = '5361' AND order_nr > ? AND financieel_afgemeld = 'FALSE'

iterator.query: SELECT MIN(order_nr) FROM dbo.machine_planning WHERE machine_id = '5361'
